name: Single Card
description: A quick single card draw for immediate insight or daily guidance

positions.name: The Card
positions.description: Your message for now — the energy or theme most relevant to your question

name: Past, Present, Future
description: A classic three-card spread showing the progression of time and how energies flow from what was, through what is, toward what will be

positions.name: Past
positions.description: What has led to this moment — the foundation and root causes

positions.name: Present
positions.description: Where you are now — the current energies and central challenge

positions.name: Future
positions.description: Where things are heading — the likely outcome if the current path continues

name: Celtic Cross
description: The most comprehensive and widely-used tarot spread, offering deep insight into a situation from multiple angles including subconscious influences, past events, and potential outcomes

positions.name: Present / Significator
positions.description: The heart of the matter — the central issue or energy surrounding your question

positions.name: Challenge / Crossing
positions.description: What crosses you — the immediate obstacle or opposing force at play

positions.name: Foundation
positions.description: The root cause — the deep foundation beneath the situation, often from the past

positions.name: Recent Past
positions.description: What is passing away — events and energies that are fading but still influential

positions.name: Crown / Best Outcome
positions.description: What crowns you — the best that can be achieved or the goal you aspire toward

positions.name: Near Future
positions.description: What is coming — the energy approaching in the near term

positions.name: Self / Attitude
positions.description: How you see yourself — your current attitude, feelings, and approach to the situation

positions.name: Environment / Others
positions.description: External influences — how others see you and the environmental factors at play

positions.name: Hopes and Fears
positions.description: Your inner hopes and fears — what you most desire and what you most dread, often intertwined

positions.name: Final Outcome
positions.description: The culmination — where this path leads if all current energies play out

name: Relationship Spread
description: A six-card spread designed to explore the dynamics between two people, whether romantic, friendship, or professional

positions.name: You
positions.description: How you show up in this relationship — your energy, role, and perspective

positions.name: The Other Person
positions.description: How the other person shows up — their energy, role, and perspective

positions.name: The Connection
positions.description: The nature of the bond between you — what draws you together

positions.name: Strengths
positions.description: The strengths and gifts this relationship offers both of you

positions.name: Challenges
positions.description: The obstacles and growth edges — what needs attention or healing

positions.name: Potential Outcome
positions.description: Where this relationship is heading — the trajectory if current patterns continue

name: Career Path Spread
description: A five-card spread focused on professional life, career decisions, and work-related challenges

positions.name: Current Situation
positions.description: Your present professional standing — where you are in your career right now

positions.name: Obstacles
positions.description: What stands in your way — the challenges and blocks in your professional path

positions.name: Hidden Strengths
positions.description: Untapped talents and resources — skills and assets you may not be fully leveraging

positions.name: Action to Take
positions.description: Recommended next step — the most productive action or mindset shift to embrace

positions.name: Potential Outcome
positions.description: Where this path leads — the likely result of following through on the guidance
